verses.text:
And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w Go|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, Let my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, that they may \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* me.
And if thou \w refuse|strong="H3986"\w* to let \add them\add* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, behold, I will \w smite|strong="H5062"\w* all thy \w borders|strong="H1366"\w* with \w frogs|strong="H6854"\w*:

And the \w river|strong="H2975"\w* shall bring \w forth|strong="H8317"\w* \w frogs|strong="H6854"\w* \w abundantly|strong="H8317"\w*, which shall go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* and \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and into thy \w bedchamber|strong="H2315"\w*, and upon thy \w bed|strong="H4296"\w*, and into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and upon thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and into thine \w ovens|strong="H8574"\w*, and into thy \w kneadingtroughs|strong="H4863"\w*:\f + \fr 8.3 \ft kneadingtroughs: or, dough\f*
And the \w frogs|strong="H6854"\w* shall come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* both on thee, and upon thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and upon all thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w Say|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, Stretch \w forth|strong="H5186"\w* thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* with thy \w rod|strong="H4294"\w* over the \w streams|strong="H5104"\w*, over the \w rivers|strong="H2975"\w*, and over the \w ponds|strong="H0098"\w*, and cause \w frogs|strong="H6854"\w* to come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* upon the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

And \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* stretched \w out|strong="H5186"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* over the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*; and the \w frogs|strong="H6854"\w* came \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, and \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

And the \w magicians|strong="H2748"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* so with their \w enchantments|strong="H3909"\w*, and brought \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w frogs|strong="H6854"\w* upon the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

¶ Then \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* for \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Intreat|strong="H6279"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, that he may take \w away|strong="H5493"\w* the \w frogs|strong="H6854"\w* from me, and from my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; and I will let the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, that they may do \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, \w Glory|strong="H6286"\w* over me: \w when|strong="H4970"\w* shall I \w intreat|strong="H6279"\w* for thee, and for thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and for thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, to \w destroy|strong="H3772"\w* the \w frogs|strong="H6854"\w* from thee and thy \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, \add that\add* they may \w remain|strong="H7604"\w* in the \w river|strong="H2975"\w* only?\f + \fr 8.9 \ft Glory…: or, Have this honour over me, etc\f*\f + \fr 8.9 \ft when: or, against when\f*\f + \fr 8.9 \ft to destroy: Heb. to cut off\f*

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, To \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w*. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add Be it\add* according to thy \w word|strong="H1697"\w*: that thou mayest \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that \add there is\add* none like unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 8.10 \ft To morrow: or, Against to morrow\f*

And the \w frogs|strong="H6854"\w* shall \w depart|strong="H5493"\w* from thee, and from thy \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, and from thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and from thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; they shall \w remain|strong="H7604"\w* in the \w river|strong="H2975"\w* only.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*: and \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w cried|strong="H6817"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* because \w of|strong="H1697"\w* the \w frogs|strong="H6854"\w* which he had \w brought|strong="H7760"\w* against \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* according to the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*; and the \w frogs|strong="H6854"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* out of the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, out of the \w villages|strong="H2691"\w*, and out of the \w fields|strong="H7704"\w*.
And they gathered them \w together|strong="H6651"\w* upon \w heaps|strong="H2563"\w*: and the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w stank|strong="H0887"\w*.

But when \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that there was \w respite|strong="H7309"\w*, he \w hardened|strong="H3513"\w* his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, and \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* not unto them; as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w said|strong="H1696"\w*.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w Say|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, Stretch \w out|strong="H5186"\w* thy \w rod|strong="H4294"\w*, and \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, that it may become \w lice|strong="H3654"\w* throughout all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

And they \w did|strong="H6213"\w* so; for \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* stretched \w out|strong="H5186"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* with his \w rod|strong="H4294"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and it became \w lice|strong="H3654"\w* in \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, and in \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*; all the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* became \w lice|strong="H3654"\w* throughout all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

And the \w magicians|strong="H2748"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* so with their \w enchantments|strong="H3909"\w* to bring \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w lice|strong="H3654"\w*, but they \w could|strong="H3201"\w* not: so there were \w lice|strong="H3654"\w* upon \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, and upon \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*.

Then the \w magicians|strong="H2748"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, This \add is\add* the \w finger|strong="H0676"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: and \w Pharaoh’s|strong="H6547"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* was \w hardened|strong="H2388"\w*, and he \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* not unto them; as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w said|strong="H1696"\w*.

¶ And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, Rise up \w early|strong="H7925"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, and \w stand|strong="H3320"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*; lo, he cometh \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to the \w water|strong="H4325"\w*; and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, Let my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, that they may \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* me.

Else, if thou wilt not let my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, behold, I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w swarms|strong="H6157"\w* \add of flies\add* upon thee, and upon thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and upon thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and into thy \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*: and the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* shall be \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of \w swarms|strong="H6157"\w* \add of flies\add*, and also the \w ground|strong="H0127"\w* whereon they \add are\add*.\f + \fr 8.21 \ft swarms…: or, a mixture of noisome beasts, etc\f*

And I will \w sever|strong="H6395"\w* in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Goshen|strong="H1657"\w*, in which my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w dwell|strong="H5975"\w*, that \w no|strong="H1115"\w* \w swarms|strong="H6157"\w* \add of flies\add* shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* there; to the \w end|strong="H4616"\w* thou mayest \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

And I will \w put|strong="H7760"\w* a \w division|strong="H6304"\w* between my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* and thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: to \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w* shall this \w sign|strong="H0226"\w* be.\f + \fr 8.23 \ft a division: Heb. a redemption\f*\f + \fr 8.23 \ft to morrow: or, by to morrow\f*

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* so; and there \w came|strong="H0935"\w* a \w grievous|strong="H3515"\w* \w swarm|strong="H6157"\w* \add of flies\add* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, and \add into\add* his \w servants’|strong="H5650"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, and into all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* was \w corrupted|strong="H7843"\w* by \w reason|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w swarm|strong="H6157"\w* \add of flies\add*.\f + \fr 8.24 \ft corrupted: or, destroyed\f*

¶ And \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and for \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w* ye, \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* to your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, It is not \w meet|strong="H3559"\w* so to \w do|strong="H6213"\w*; \w for|strong="H2005"\w* we shall \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* the \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* of the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: lo, shall we \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* the \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* of the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* before their \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and will they not \w stone|strong="H5619"\w* us?

We will \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days’|strong="H3117"\w* \w journey|strong="H1870"\w* into the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, and \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, as he shall \w command|strong="H0559"\w* us.

And \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I will let you \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, that ye may \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*; only ye shall not \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w very|strong="H7368"\w* far \w away|strong="H7368"\w*: \w intreat|strong="H6279"\w* for \w me|strong="H1157"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, I go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from thee, and I will \w intreat|strong="H6279"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* that the \w swarms|strong="H6157"\w* \add of flies\add* may \w depart|strong="H5493"\w* from \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, from his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and from his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, to \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w*: \w but|strong="H7535"\w* let not \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* deal \w deceitfully|strong="H2048"\w* any \w more|strong="H3254"\w* in \w not|strong="H1115"\w* letting the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w* to \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* to the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.
And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, and \w intreated|strong="H6279"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* according to the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*; and he \w removed|strong="H5493"\w* the \w swarms|strong="H6157"\w* \add of flies\add* from \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, from his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and from his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; there \w remained|strong="H7604"\w* not \w one|strong="H0259"\w*.

And \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w hardened|strong="H3513"\w* his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* at this \w time|strong="H6471"\w* also, neither would he let the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*.
